eventDecorators.name: DonationSent
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a grant receives a donation.

eventDecorators.name: MetadataUpdated
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a grant round metadata pointer is updated.

functionDecorators.name: addMatchingFunds
functionDecorators.description: Before the round ends this method accepts matching pool funds.

parameterDecorators.name: _amount
parameterDecorators.description: The amount of matching token that will be sent to the contract for the matching pool.

functionDecorators.name: donationToken
functionDecorators.description: Token used for all contributions. Contributions in a different token are swapped to this token.

functionDecorators.name: endTime
functionDecorators.description: Unix timestamp of the end of the round.

functionDecorators.name: hasPaidOut
functionDecorators.description: Set to true if grant round has ended and payouts have been released.

functionDecorators.name: isActive
functionDecorators.description: Returns true if the round is active, false otherwise.

functionDecorators.name: matchingToken
functionDecorators.description: Token used to payout match amounts at the end of a round.

functionDecorators.name: metaPtr
functionDecorators.description: URL pointing to grant round metadata (for off-chain use).

functionDecorators.name: minContribution
functionDecorators.description: minimum contribution amount that can be made.

functionDecorators.name: payoutGrants
functionDecorators.description: When the round ends the payoutAdmin can send the remaining matching pool funds to a given address.

parameterDecorators.name: _payoutAddress
parameterDecorators.description: An address to receive the remaining matching pool funds in the contract.

functionDecorators.name: startTime
functionDecorators.description: Unix timestamp of the start of the round.

functionDecorators.name: updateMetadataPtr
functionDecorators.description: Updates the metadata pointer to a new location.

parameterDecorators.name: _newMetaPtr
parameterDecorators.description: A string where the updated metadata is stored.
